title: The Amazing Screw-On Head
overview: When arch-fiend Emperor Zombie steals an artifact that will enable him to threaten all life on Earth, the task of stopping him is assigned to Screw-on Head. Fortunately, Screw-On Head is not alone on this perilous quest. He is aided by his multi talented manservant, Mr. Groin, and by his talking canine cohort, Mr. Dog.
